title: NEED HELP identifying a font
content:
Please help me find out what typestyle this is:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130158im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sandiego2_5723.jpg)

thank you

 [‹ modernist block typefaces - ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130158/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47934 "Go to previous forum topic") [Symmetrical Diagonal Stroke Contrast! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130158/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47918 "Go to next forum topic")
author: MarketingGuru

comments.content:
It’s an old Image Club font called Republik Sans:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/republik-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905130158/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/republik-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/republik-sans/")
